Package minesweeper

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • minesweeper.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    class Tile
extends javax.swing.JButton
    An extension of the JButton class to be used as tiles of a Minesweeper game.

    • Nested Class Summary
